channel.title: [HELP] LocalHost DC... [REP++] [HELP]
channel.description:
So i just downloaded this new client and wanted to try it out... but when i logged in i got this in my server's Run.Bat
[code][client-1-name]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 0ms]
Game saved for player name ClientHandler: Client name disconnected (localhost)[/code]
- Delta Source

item.title: [HELP] LocalHost DC... [REP++] [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @snakefang snakefang
item.description:
@snakefang wrote:

[quote=“pistolse, post:3, topic:274400”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=362538.msg2755057#msg2755057 date=1240152999]
i think it’s to do with the client your using… found a file called server open the one with the cog on the image and tell me what it says in there.
[/quote]

I got no file called “server open” and cog thingy where is it :o btw the client is “Menno’s client”[/quote]

From what i did with mennos client, menno client will ONLY connect to menno’s source.

Use silab for the time being until you have the time to make your own, or steal someone elses.

Read full topic
